entry.title: First Post
entry.content: I dont know the reason for making this blog. Was it because it’s 2 AM and I dont know what else to do? Is it because I got a dopamine hit from reading an article whose title says Don’t End The Week With Nothing? Is it because I didnt feel proud of the past week and want to start this new week with a bang? Whichever the case, let’s see where this blog goes.
